title: The store will not open
body: I can open every single other tab in the client, but when i click on the store button, it just goes to a black/blue screen and stays there permanently. The store absolutely refuses to open. I've tried reopening the client and still nothing. Even left it on that screen for 20 mins and it still wont open.

replies.body: The black screen may be due to a connection problem failing to reach the server properly, so it can't download any assets.  Try our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to troubleshoot this for a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
